ChangeList.Description: Added the **authenticationStrengthRoot** relationship to the [conditionalAccessRoot](https://learn.microsoft.com/graph/api/resources/conditionalAccessRoot?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the **authenticationStrengthPolicies** relationship to the [policyRoot](https://learn.microsoft.com/graph/api/resources/policyRoot?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the [authenticationStrengthPolicy](https://learn.microsoft.com/graph/api/resources/authenticationStrengthPolicy?view=graph-rest-beta) resource and its associated methods.
Added the **authenticationMethodModes** enumeration type.
Added the **authenticationStrengthPolicyType** enumeration type.
Added the **authenticationStrengthRequirements** enumeration type.
Added the **baseAuthenticationMethod** enumeration type.
Added the [updateAllowedCombinationsResult](https://learn.microsoft.com/graph/api/resources/updateAllowedCombinationsResult?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the [authenticationStrengthUsage](https://learn.microsoft.com/graph/api/resources/authenticationStrengthUsage?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the [authenticationCombinationConfiguration](https://learn.microsoft.com/graph/api/resources/authenticationCombinationConfiguration?view=graph-rest-beta) resource and its associated methods.
Added the [authenticationMethodModeDetail](https://learn.microsoft.com/graph/api/resources/authenticationMethodModeDetail?view=graph-rest-beta) resource and its associated methods.
Added the [fido2CombinationConfiguration](https://learn.microsoft.com/graph/api/resources/fido2CombinationConfiguration?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added the [updateAllowedCombinations](https://learn.microsoft.com/graph/api/authenticationstrengthpolicy-updateAllowedCombinations?view=graph-rest-beta) method to the [authenticationStrengthPolicy](https://learn.microsoft.com/graph/api/resources/authenticationStrengthPolicy?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added the [findByMethodMode](https://learn.microsoft.com/graph/api/authenticationstrengthpolicy-findByMethodMode?view=graph-rest-beta) method to the [authenticationStrengthPolicy](https://learn.microsoft.com/graph/api/resources/authenticationStrengthPolicy?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added the [usage](https://learn.microsoft.com/graph/api/authenticationstrengthpolicy-usage?view=graph-rest-beta) method to the [authenticationStrengthPolicy](https://learn.microsoft.com/graph/api/resources/authenticationStrengthPolicy?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added the **featureSettings** property to the [microsoftAuthenticatorAuthenticationMethodConfiguration](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/microsoftAuthenticatorAuthenticationMethodConfiguration?view=graph-rest-beta) resource. This property allows you to configure Microsoft Authenticator settings such as number matching and location context, and whether they are enabled for all users or specific users only.
Added the [microsoftAuthenticatorFeatureSettings](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/microsoftAuthenticatorFeatureSettings?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the **featureTargetType** enumeration.

Added the [authenticationMethodFeatureConfiguration](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/authenticationMethodFeatureConfiguration?view=graph-rest-beta) resource. Use this resource to configure users that are allowed from using an authentication method.
Added the [featureTarget](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/featureTarget?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Deprecated the **displayAppInformationRequiredState** property of the [microsoftAuthenticatorAuthenticationMethodTarget](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/microsoftAuthenticatorAuthenticationMethodTarget?view=graph-rest-beta) resource. Use the **displayAppInformationRequiredState** property of the [microsoftAuthenticatorFeatureSettings](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/microsoftAuthenticatorFeatureSettings?view=graph-rest-beta) resource instead.

Deprecated the **numberMatchingRequiredState** property of the [microsoftAuthenticatorAuthenticationMethodTarget](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/microsoftAuthenticatorAuthenticationMethodTarget?view=graph-rest-beta) resource. Use the **numberMatchingRequiredState** property of the [microsoftAuthenticatorFeatureSettings](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/microsoftAuthenticatorFeatureSettings?view=graph-rest-beta) resource instead.
Added the **authenticationMethodsPolicyMigrationState** enumeration.

Added the **excludeTargets** property to the [authenticationMethodConfiguration](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/authenticationMethodConfiguration?view=graph-rest-beta) resource. Use this property to specify the groups of users that are excluded from an authentication methods policy.
Added the **policyMigrationState** property to the [authenticationMethodsPolicy](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/authenticationMethodsPolicy?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added the **isSoftwareOathEnabled** property to the [microsoftAuthenticatorAuthenticationMethodConfiguration](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/microsoftAuthenticatorAuthenticationMethodConfiguration?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added the [softwareOathAuthenticationMethodConfiguration](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/softwareOathAuthenticationMethodConfiguration?view=graph-rest-beta) resource and its associated methods.

Added the [voiceAuthenticationMethodConfiguration](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/voiceAuthenticationMethodConfiguration?view=graph-rest-beta) resource and its associated methods.
Added the [voiceAuthenticationMethodTarget](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/voiceAuthenticationMethodTarget?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the **authenticationMethodsPolicyMigrationState** enumeration type.
Added the `excludeTargets` property to the [authenticationMethodConfiguration](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/authenticationMethodConfiguration?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.
Added the `policyMigrationState` property to the [authenticationMethodsPolicy](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/authenticationMethodsPolicy?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.

Added the `isSoftwareOathEnabled` property to the [microsoftAuthenticatorAuthenticationMethodConfiguration](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/microsoftAuthenticatorAuthenticationMethodConfiguration?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.
Added the [smsAuthenticationMethodConfiguration](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/smsAuthenticationMethodConfiguration?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource
Added the [smsAuthenticationMethodTarget](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/smsAuthenticationMethodTarget?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource
Added the [softwareOathAuthenticationMethodConfiguration](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/softwareOathAuthenticationMethodConfiguration?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource
Added the [voiceAuthenticationMethodConfiguration](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/voiceAuthenticationMethodConfiguration?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource
Added the [voiceAuthenticationMethodTarget](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/voiceAuthenticationMethodTarget?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource

Added the `companionAppAllowedState` property to the [microsoftAuthenticatorFeatureSettings](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/microsoftAuthenticatorFeatureSettings?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
